name: What the Factory!
description:
What the Factory!

Ready for totally avoidable factory accidents? In this game, it's your job to prevent the death of your workers who insist on putting themselves right in the middle of danger by dragging them around and operating the machines at the right time. 

If you like to have absolute control over everything just to fail and let all your workers die in a moments notice, then I suggest you try it out and see if you like it.

In case of any bugs or you just wanna give your opinion about the game be sure to leave a comment, it would help us out a lot.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SpawnPoint9000

Website: https://www.spawnpoint.pt/

Note: This is not the final version of the game, therefore this build is subject to change. Additionally all the files in this game need to be in the same folder for the game to run, if any of them is moved or deleted the game will not run
